title: Explain Closing Costs to a First-Time Buyer
description: A first-time homebuyer is confused about the estimated closing costs. The agent needs to explain the different fees.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Loan Estimate document for the buyer's transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the document that lists the estimated closing costs.

tasks.description: Break down the major categories of closing costs: lender fees, title/escrow fees, and prepaid items (taxes, insurance).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent categorizes the costs for clarity.

tasks.description: Explain the purpose of each major fee in simple, easy-to-understand language.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear and patient explanation to the client.
